languages.text: This creature has (5 * Pet's WIL Bonus) temporary Wounds and (Pet's WIL Bonus * Pet's AGI Bonus) additional Armor.

traits.locale_text: This creature has (5 * Pet's WIL Bonus) temporary Wounds and (Pet's WIL Bonus * Pet's AGI Bonus) additional Armor.
Gains +<u>(5 × psyber-raven's WP bonus)</u> temporary wounds and +<u>(psyber-raven's WP bonus × psyber-raven's AGI bonus)</u> armour.

languages.text: Se incrementa la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} en un +<u>(bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} del psicocuervo × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} del psicocuervo)</u> %.
